text: On 8 January 2025, an attack happened at the presidential palace in the Chadian capital Nâ€™Djamena by unknown attackers. At least 20 people were killed in the attack, including 18 attackers and two soldiers. ==References== Category:January 2025 events Category:21st century in Chad Category:2025 in Africa Category:2025 crimes Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2020s Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in Africa Category:Terrorist incidents in Africa in the 2020s
